View.Name: KinFlQry
View.SQL: SELECT AitiKin, Cash, id, IdSyn, KoKiKin, Memo, RegistryDate, Seira, Status, Summary, SalesPerson FROM KinFl UNION ALL (SELECT AitiKin, Cash, id, IdSyn, SUBSTRING(KinFl.KoKiKin, 1, 1) + CAST(CAST(SUBSTRING(KinFl.KoKiKin, 2, 1) AS int) - 1 AS VARCHAR) AS KoKiKin, Memo, RegistryDate, Seira, Status, Summary, SalesPerson FROM KinFl WHERE KinFl.Cash = '1' AND KinFl.KoKiKin <> '00' AND KinFl.KoKiKin <> '02' AND KinFl.KoKiKin <> '10' AND KinFl.KoKiKin <> '12')

View.Name: KinFlQry
View.SQL: SELECT KinFl.AitiKin, KinFl.Cash, KinFl.id, KinFl.IdSyn, KinFl.KoKiKin, KinFl.Memo, KinFl.RegistryDate, KinFl.Seira, KinFl.Status, KinFl.Summary, KinFl.SalesPerson FROM KinFl UNION ALL SELECT KinFl.AitiKin, KinFl.Cash, KinFl.id, KinFl.IdSyn, Mid(KinFl.KoKiKin,1,1) + Cstr(Val(Mid(KinFl.KoKiKin,2,1))-1) AS KoKiKin, KinFl.Memo, KinFl.RegistryDate, KinFl.Seira, KinFl.Status, KinFl.Summary, KinFl.SalesPerson FROM KinFl WHERE Cash = "1" And KinFl.KoKiKin <> "00" And KinFl.KoKiKin <> "02" And KinFl.KoKiKin <> "10" And KinFl.KoKiKin <> "12"
